title: Naomi Watts looks relaxed on school run in New York
title_page: Naomi Watts looks relaxed on school run in New York | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's the Oscar-nominated actress who was recently spotted sharing an emotional hug with her former partner Liev Schreiber.
And on Thursday, mother-of-two Naomi Watts took time out of her busy schedule to focus on her family, picking up her sons from school in New York.
The 48-year-old appeared comfortable and confident as she pounded the pavement, carrying a black case as she ran errands with a friend.
Watts going on? Naomi looked relaxed as she pounded the New York pavement while picking up her sons from school on Thursday
The King Kong actress dressed appropriately for the city's cool temperatures, sporting a long denim skirt that finished just below her ankles.
She paired it with a striped shirt, a black leather-look jacket and comfortable white sneakers.
Naomi's short blonde bob framed her face, and she also wore pale pink sunglasses as she checked her phone.
She opted for minimal makeup on the outing, keeping a casual look and allowing her natural beauty to shine through.
Busy mum: The British-Australian actress focused on her family, watching as one of the boys clung to a pole on the walk home from school
Watch me! Naomi is mum to Alexander 'Sasha' Pete, nine, and Samuel 'Sammy' Kai, eight,
The British-Australian actress carried a black case as well as some shopping.
She looked in happy and relaxed spirits after running errands with a friend.
While she strolled along, one of the boys decided to jump up on a pole and cling to it as his mother watched on.
Running errands: Naomi stepped out to run some errands with a friend, keeping things casual and comfortable in her white sneakers
Naomi is mother to Alexander 'Sasha' Pete, nine, and Samuel 'Sammy' Kai, eight, who she shares with ex Lieve Schreiber.
The couple were together for 11 years, before separating in September last year.
Earlier this month, they were spotted sharing an emotional embrace outside the home of Minnie Driver's older sister Kate.
Liev, 49, planted a kiss on Naomi's cheek as the Hollywood actress wrapped her arms around his neck during their bittersweet moment.
What's in the case? The blonde beauty carried a mysterious case while out in New York
Gypsy: Naomi has been busy shooting scenes in New York for her role in the upcoming HBO series Gypsy
Naomi has been busy shooting scenes in New York for her role in the upcoming HBO series Gypsy.
She plays therapist Jean Holloway, who becomes too involved in her patients' lives.
The blonde was spotted on set last month, with the first two episodes of the 10-part series directed by Sam Taylor-Johnson.
